鬵字的基本解释

鬵
zèng
古同“甑”。

鬵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qín］
［《廣韻》昨淫切，平侵，從。］
［《廣韻》徐林切，平侵，邪。］
［《廣韻》昨鹽切，平鹽，從。］
釜类烹器。

鬵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬲字部】　鬵； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1459第21
〔古文〕?【廣韻】徐林切【集韻】【韻會】徐心切，?音尋。【說文】大釜也。一曰鼎大上小下若甑曰鬵。【詩·曹風】漑之釜鬵。【傳】鬵，釜屬。【爾雅·釋器】䰝謂之鬵。鬵，鉹也。【註】涼州呼鉹。【揚子·方言】甑，自關而東謂之甗，或謂之鬵。　又【廣韻】鬵，疾也。　又【廣韻】昨鹽切【集韻】【韻會】慈鹽切，?音潛。又【集韻】才淫切，音尋。又緇岑切，音簪。義?同。

鬵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬵字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［qín］
["Guangyun" yesterday lewdly, flatly invaded, from. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Linqie, flat invasion, evil. ]
["Guangyun" salt cut yesterday, flat salt, from. ]
Kettle cooker.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Feizi Department】　鬵; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1459 No. 21
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] Xu Linqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xu Xinqie, search for sound. [Said the text] The cauldron is also. One said that the tripod is big, the upper part is small, and the lower part is Ruozeng said 鬵. 【Poetry·Cao Feng】The Cauldron of Shun. [Biography] 鬵, the genus of the cauldron. [Erya·Release Device] What is called the 鬵.鬵, 鉹 also. [Note] Liangzhou Huzhu. [Yangtze Dialect] Zeng, from Guan to Dong is called Zhi Zhi, or Zhi Zhi.　[Guangyun] 鬵, disease also.　[Guangyun] Salt cut yesterday [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Kind salt cut, sound potential. Also 【Jiyun】is lustful, and finds the sound. It's hard to cut again, and the sound hairpin. Righteous? Same.
